python-muckrock
=====================

A simple Python wrapper for the `MuckRock API <https://muckrock.com/api_v2/>`_

Features
--------

* Search and retrieve requests, request communications and files
* Create new requests
* Search for agencies and jurisdictions
* Access your user and organization information
